title: Abdul Hafeez Sheikh to win Senate election: Sheikh Rasheed
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 3 (APP): Minister for Interior Sheikh Rasheed Ahmad on Wednesday said that today is the day of democracy and Abdul Hafeez Sheikh will win Senate election.
Talking to media outside Parliament House, he said that peopleâ€™s problems were exploited during the outset of elections to secure political gains.
He said that now we should proceed toward elections reforms in the country to strengthen democracy.
He said that the Senate election in Punjab was easily conducted.
